text: One of the best pizzas I have eaten!  Geaux Cajuns!

name: Kellyn Dickerson
text: Every time I go here it's always great customer service, great prices, and amazing food. I highly recommend this for anyone looking for a local pizza place.

name: Katherine Sprinkle
text: Their calzones and breadsticks are awesome! I'm picky about my pasta, and didn't quite care for theirs. Quick service, great prices! One order of breadsticks is enough to fill me up (it's the size of a small pizza) and is less than $4 after tax.

name: Dottie Byron
text: Great pizza. Great atmosphere. Great place. If there's a wait, sit at the bar. It's worth it.

name: John Sipperley
text: So delicious. Friendly staff, but easily overwhelmed. So go when it is slow. I go at lunch and sit at the bar, typically alone with easy access to service.  But I can see this dropping stars, having watched the service to other tables. Fortunately, that has not yet been my experience.

name: Matt Cobb
text: The pasta, especially the carbonara, is very good and you get a lot of it. The pizza is very good as well.

name: Nik Martin
text: Good pizza, but there's a weird vibe in the restaurant, and previous reviews suggest it's due to the owner's personality. The staff is friendly, but act like they're scared to be too friendly or else they might get in trouble. It's like everyone is under a lot of stress, and it sort of transferred over to my party while we were there. We just couldn't get relaxed while we were there. They have an old school gas deck oven that turns out really good pizza, but it would honestly be 100% better without the stressful vibe we got while dining. Maybe the owner should step away and hire a manger to run the front-of-house, that has better customer service skills.

name: Todd Fowler
text: Cadillac Pizza and Carbonara Pasta are fantastic!

name: Tabatha White
text: The best pizza & pasta I have ever had every thing is made from scratch and to order. If you ever get a chance I promise you will love it!!!! The staff is very friendly and service was top notch!!! Will be back for sure!!!!

name: Mari Flores
text: The food was good, especially the pasta dishes. They have large portions and great friendly service. I would eat there again.

name: Jesse Jordan
text: TBH the pizza was average, our large margarita was a little oily but did have good flavor. Crust was also very well done. Staff was quick with our order and had no shortage of great stories to tell. Not gonna find anything better downtown.

name: Agent Phrosty
text: Glad I didn't pay much attention to the one star reviews. Came to Mobile overnight to visit with a friend for his birthday. We walked in around 930 and we were promptly greeted and served drinks. Ordered the Cadillac pizza... Ten minutes tops from ordering to the table. Toppings were generous, crust and sauce both were very good. Never had to ask for refills. Would definitely recommend.

name: Mike Baucom
text: Went during Art Walk so it was packed as expected. Good food, "hole in the wall' atmosphere, friendly staff. Will definitely go again.

text: I ordered take out. The pizza is good. Had a glass of wine while I waited. Ladies were friendly and awesome. I would definitely come back.

name: Ryan Reiff
text:
Dropped our pizza. Only told us about it after the fact.  Pizza was ok, but dripping with grease....like the crust was wet with a slight crunch. So if you have a hour before you want to eat,  this place is for you.  Btw carryout your food  because the restaurant is like 200sqft, plus you'll actually get your pizza in a timely manner.

Other fun fact: charges you a cc fee to pay them.

Oh one more thing if you walk there,  bums will ask you for money.

To sum it all up. If you want to wait to eat wet pizza ,pay extra, and feel like you're a  burden. Eat here.

Oh and I thing the manger hate kids.

text: Wonderful service and delicious food;

name: Chris Golden
text: Washed it down with some strawberry cake.  And get this.....with me and my party of 3 teenagers and 3 kids, we were only $7 more than my ChickFilA order.  Whereby my mobile app order crashed and burned for the ChickFilA option.  But that's another story.  And don't get me started on Subway nearby.  Dude!!!!

name: Noah Weitkemper
text: Took well over an hour to get a cheese pizza and a bowl of fettuccine Alfredo with chicken.  After 40 minutes I asked the waitress if she forgot to drop my order to which she told me no and began to argue with me only to produce the receipts and show that she had waited almost 9 minutes to drop my order my problem was I paid when I ordered a to go order the owner showed up before my food came out and one of his regular customers that had been sitting at the bar the entire time I was waiting for my pizza told him that there was an issue with me. He comes over to find out what the issue is and I explained to him how it's been forever since I ordered a cheese pizza and a bowl of pasta for my kids that are in the hotel Room starving to which he apologized and went to ask the waitress what was going on. She whispered to him that I was being belligerent and rude even though that is entirely untrue the patron at the bar can attest to that. The owner then turned to me and explain to me how the customer is not always right as if I had been causing a problem to which I explained to him the only issue I've created was when I asked where my order was at no time was I ever belligerent and he should talk to people around to find out the truth before just blindly believing his head waitress. In the end he felt he should give me my money back I got my pizza the fed achenia turned out to be linguine the chicken was so overcooked it was in edible. The pizza was great the service was total  Krapp. The airconditioner in the front of the store is leaking water so much that they had to empty a picture and it was all over the floor entire time. There are plenty of other eateries around I would not waste my time here unless you are in absolutely no hurry at all whatsoever and there's no other customers in the restaurant.

resp.text: Yea Noah i did talk to the customer at the bar after you left. He told me a total different version than the one you told. You gotta admit you were acting way over the top about a ten minute dispute. More than one customer came up and said not to reprimand the server that it was you that was being rude and belligerent as soon as you came in. You got your order in a reasonable time. And I did comp it for you. Your reporting a leaking ac unit on a review? Really? It leaked for a couple hours and was repaired. Thanks Noah business is bustling, ac is fine.

name: Shannon Bender
text:
A note to the owner / manager:

We had a TERRIBLE experience at your establishment because of the awful service. Would give no stars if I could.

We came to Pizzeria Delphine on a Sunday evening based on the great reviews of your food, however we were not even able to try the food due to the horrible service we received, on top of the fact you made us the wrong pizza after we waited nearly an hour.

When we arrived, it was clear that your restaurant was busy, and the three young girls you had as servers were CLEARLY OVERWHELMED and NOT PROPERLY TRAINED to handle more than a handful of tables.

We stood in front waiting for someone to acknowledge us, while your servers ran around stressed out, and a woman whom I assume was a manager sat behind the counter and was writing things down on a clipboard, and answering the phone - even though we had called three times prior to stopping by to place our to-go order and NO ONE ANSWERED THE PHONES.

Eventually, I stopped one of the servers on her way to a table and told her we want to place an order, she wrote it down in her notepad and then ran out the door to take care of other tables. Didn't ask for our name or number to call when it was ready.

We stood around for another 10 minutes waiting for her to come back so we could tell her to get our number to call us when it was ready. She told us it would be about 30 minutes and they would call.

Almost an hour later, we received no phone call and I had to call them to ask if it was ready, which they said it was.

I walked back over from our hotel, paid for our pizza, only to find out when I opened the box (because they clearly didn't check it) that she had put the wrong order in for our pizza.

At that point we told them we just wanted a refund.

WE RECEIVED NO APOLOGIES FROM YOUR INCOMPETENT AND UNTRAINED STAFF, JUST AN ATTITUDE.

I don't care how good the pizza is, your service was awful.

name: Bob Fox
text:
I am staying at a local hotel on business with no transportation as we are transported to our events so I thought I would order something delivered. I called Delfina's and a rude young female answered. I told her I couldn't see her on line menu & she insisted it was there. When I asked her the cost of a small pizza delivered she told me they don't deliver even though the ad says different. When I asked her what the costs would be she said she didn't have a clue. Maybe she's got that right.
Too many good restaurants in Mobile SO I'll not recommend & will find something else.

resp.text:
Bob sorry about the confusion.  We do not deliver but we sub it out to people who do. They charge a small percentage and delivery charge. We do not know what your total will be after they include their fee. If you go to the Port City Delivery App or the WAITR App you will see the menus on there with the pricing. It's all gone high tech now days. We are only a couple of blocks from most of the hotels and you can call to p
ick it up and usually ready within twenty minutes. As far as the rudeness I apologize. This restaurant is very small and can get very loud. We have to speak loudly and have a difficult time hearing so it can be confused, HE. Thanks Bob

name: Kirsten Schwehm
text: We ran through on the way from Florida to Baton Rouge - holy moley, that is authentic Italian food! We had pizza, pasta, and salads, and everything was fresh and delicious. The service was great and we were in and out quickly, thoigh everything was clearly cooked to order. The bathroom is tiny and ramshackle, but that could not diminish our enthusiasm!

The pizza was delicious I couldn’t believe how good it was being from Pittsburgh were you have real Italians cooking your pizza I am very picky about my pie. But these guys blew me away I felt like I was home again!!! It’s a must try and I will be back more often to try other dishes they all looked amazing while I was there!!! But again the pizza was a hit!!!

text: I'm a Mobile native and vocalist! I left here in 99' for college! I recently moved back home after 5 years in New Orleans!! Upon coming back home 6 months ago,  I was treated as an outsider in my own hometown ! I'm a street performer who will sing anywhere, and usually scoffed at while performing on daulphin St. ;however there are some Managers and business owners that welcome me to sing near their location!! I've never eaten here,as I'm a poor man who eats at home, but I do know that the Owner,  Management , and Staff are warm, friendly, and hospitable! THANKS GUYS FOR LENDING YOUR EARS AND BEING SUPPORTIVE DURING THIS VERY DIFFICULT TRANSITION!! LET'S SPREAD THIS ETHIC TO NOT ONLY DOWNTOWN MOBILE, BUT ALL OVER THE CITY OF MOBILE, BUT ALL OVER THE WORLD!!

name: *Top Tier Predator*
text: Ive had just about every pizza available in mobile county especially all the top rated pizza spots according to the online ratings & pizzeria delphina is the best ive had so far! After having my first slice of there pizza i dont see how pizza could get any better.. when i took my first bite it was unexplainable how heavenly it tasted.. i literally felt like i melted in my seat as i chewed on that scrumptious bite of heaven.   I love the fact that the pizza seems to be cooked in either a coal fire or wood fire brick oven as it gives the new york thin like crust a good crispy crust but yet not hard like a brick.. it was perfect & just the way i like it 😁 i never been to new york (home of the supposedly best pizza in the world) but it would be hard for me to believe they can can make a pizza any better than this.. its a little pricey but its well worth it whenever u got the money to spend.. do yourself a favor & stop by.. this is now my favorite pizza place of all time but i will continue to look & taste test other pizza places in near by areas & hopefully get to go to new york one day & test there pizza to see how it measures up ☺

name: Paul Buhrmester
text: We were so very amazed and impressed by Mama Lottie's Pizza!! While googling places to eat while in Gulf Shores, we settled on pizza. This place had good reviews, so we drove on over. Our group of eleven dined in, even though it was a little bit warm inside. There service was great! The food looked, smelled, and tasted amazing! Handmade dough, and fresh start to finish. And you could tell by the traffic, that this pizza place is enjoyed by many locals. We'll make sure to come back whenever we're in town 😊

name: Airbrush Ink
text: Well I honestly don’t know how the food tastes.   The service however, isn’t the friendliest Ive experienced for sure.   Went by about two weeks ago around 2 o’clock walked in, and was immediately told they don’t open till 3 o’clock!    No other words were spoken as the woman returned to the back of the restaurant.   Even though the door has a pretty large sign that says open daily at 11am.   But ok no worries, come back around 3:30 today to get a couple of slices of pizza because heck it says pizza by the slice on the window as well.   But was told NOPE we only do pizza by the slice till 3.    Again nothing else was said.   But wait y’all open at 3 right!?    No suggestions on maybe a small pizza place r anything like that.   Hey no worries, I’ll take my hard earned money else where.   Best of luck.

name: Jennifer Ewan
text: We ordered 7 pizzas for delivery. The girl on the phone was SUPER nice & let me know it would be an hour & a half. We expected a long wait due to how busy every place in town had been, so that was no big deal. Pizza was delivered a bit early & was absolutely delicious. The delivery lady was also very nice. We'll definitely be repeat customers!

name: Sarah Moss
text: Amazing pizza!  Kind and helpful staff.

resp.text: Sarah, thank you for swinging by! Hope you come back our way. -Devin, Manager

name: Haplo One
text: Best meal we had while in GF!  The first as well.  Within walking distance of the condo, and the staff was very friendly.  They were very busy but the pie was ready quickly and was pretty damn good.  Highly recommend.

resp.text: Haplo, thanks so much for taking a quick walk to come see us. We're happy to have extended a warm welcome to Gulf Shores with a delicious slice. Hope to see you back many more times! -Devin, Manager

name: Mark Masavage
text:
Great pizza and better service.

We arrived to the area late Saturday and ordered pizza from papa John's. They told us it would be ready in 20 mins, but when we went to pick it up, they told us 2hrs. I cancelled the order, and when driving back to the condo, I spotted Mama Lottie's. I stopped in, in hopes they were still taking orders. Unfortunately, they stopped taking orders 2hrs before, but were still making carry outs!

Even though I did not leave with a pizza, I left with a smile, because of the great attitude of the people working.

Because of this experience, we ordered  Mama Lottie's on Thursday. They said it would be ready in 30min. It was, and the service was just as friendly. The pizza was very good, as well.

resp.text: Mark, we're so glad we were able to turn your pizza experience around! Thanks for spotting us and giving us a shot to impress you. The next time you're in the area, we'll have a pizza pie with your name on it! -Devin, Manager

name: jason allman
text: Food is amazing. Prices are very reasonable. People that work there are very friendly. I highly recommend them.

name: Jon Moor
text: Not a bad pizza. Fresh ingredients always a plus+!

resp.text: Jon, it's great you could visit us! We'd love to have you back our way soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Josh Lea
text: We are locals and this is our pizza spot. Every time we have family visiting we order Momma Lottis and they are blown away! Eat here! You won’t be disappointed

resp.text: Josh, we're honored to have you as one of our regulars. It's always a pleasure to serve you. See you back the next time you're craving a slice. -Devin, Manager

name: Jon Moor
text: Not a bad pizza. Fresh ingredients always a plus+!

resp.text: Jon, it's great you could visit us! We'd love to have you back our way soon. -Devin, Manager

name: David Rodriquez
text: Just average, average price ($22.00  18" supreme), ample cheese, skimpy on toppings but everything was fresh. All in all, I would try somewhere else.

resp.text: David, we're sorry to hear that we didn't blow you away with flavor. We would have loved to have been told so we could have offered you up something else you might have liked better. Next time, we'd certainly love to make a suggestion. Hope to see you again. -Devin, Manager

name: Diana Olkowski
text: Great pizza and fast delivery! Top notch service. We enjoyed it!

resp.text: Diana, nothing beats getting a hot slice of ooey gooey pizza right to your door. Thanks for ordering from us -- see you again soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Joe Johnson
text: Good pizza.  Great price.... especially for the area

resp.text: Joe, happy to hear you can always count on us for a slice done right. You're always welcome back whenever you're close by. See you soon! -Devin, Manager

name: clayton nicholson
text: Great pizza! Even when they are covered up on a Friday night they don't skip on quality.

resp.text: Clayton, nothing better than to end your week with a delicious slice. Thanks for braving the crowd to grab some with us. Hope to see you back for some more the next time the craving strikes! See you soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Josh Keers
text: Love the customer service., and is must if you are in Gulfshores AL.

resp.text: Josh, thanks for always making us a stop whenever you're in town. It's a joy to serve you. Hope to see you back for another slice soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Gary Eaves
text: A lot of places claim to have “New York Style” Pizza.....Then you end up with something not even close! Well we just tried this place for the first time, and they aren't kidding! Delicious thin crust, great quality toppings and lots of them....We had the Meat lovers with extra cheese and it was truly on point....I normally eat three slices of pizza, but I maxed out with two of theirs....Absolutely the best pizza Ive had in Gulf Shores! Mama’s just became our “Go to” Pizza house! And the young lady that delivered our Pizza was outstanding!

resp.text: Gary, we're glad we held up our end of the deal when it comes to authentic 'New York Style' pizza. Meat lovers certainly is a crowd pleaser when it's done right -- adding extra cheese on top was the right move! Can't wait to see you back again and again for another pizza pie. -Devin, Manager

name: Maureen Doubleday
text: We had gluten free cauliflower crust pizza and it was amazing. The staff was very friendly and fun, service was fast. We had our pizza in 10 minutes. This will most definitely be our go to pizza place.

resp.text: Maureen, no matter how you eat, you should be able to enjoy delicious pizza! Thanks for checking us and our cauliflower crust out -- so glad you loved it! Can't wait to see you back again soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Mud Zombie
text:
SUCH GOOD PIZZA!

We are on vacation and looking for a place that would deliver out to the end of Fort Morgan. Every pizza place told me no but Mama Lotties actually offered to drive it to the Chevron and meet me.
Beyond that, the pizza is incredible! Such delicious crust, plenty of cheese and a very good sauce! We got the pepperoni and cheese and the cheese lovers. The pepperoni and cheese is one of the best I have ever had before and the cheese lovers was like nothing I’ve ever had on a pizza before. If you love feta and ricotta cheese it’s a must try for sure!
If you’re in the Gulf Shores area you MUST try Mama Lotties!

name: Keila Quiles
text: Ok pizza not a lot of flavor. Wouldn't eat it again. Chicago pizza is the best.

resp.text: Keila, we're sorry to hear our style pizza wasn't for you. We understand that there are so many different kinds and we may not be for everyone. We appreciate you checking us out though! -Devin, Manager

name: Kait Levin
text: Great fresh pizza! We got the Margherita with pepperoni and the crust was nice and crunchy and the herbs were fresh.

resp.text: Kait, delicious choice -- happy to hear you loved it! We only use the best ingredients. Looking forward to serving you up another pizza pie soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Denise L
text: Mama lotties house special pizza is amazing! Will definitely be my go to pizza from now on!!

resp.text: Denise, we're honored to snag that number one spot in your heart. It's a pleasure to serve you up a delicious pizza pie. See you back soon enough! -Devin, Manager

name: gmoneysbaby
text: The pizza is amazing. Eat at the Gulf Shores location every monday for lunch! For $5.99+tax you get 2 giant slices and a drink. Love the staff that's in there. DeeDee is the sweetest ever and makes some the best sweet tea! Love these guys 😍.

resp.text: What an amazing tradition to kick your week off right! We're always so happy to see you walk through our doors. See you this upcoming Monday for your slices! -Devin, Manager

name: Phil Morgan
text: My goto pizza. And they have gluten-free pizza.

resp.text: Thanks so much for joining us, Phil! Hoping to see you here in the future. -Devin, Manager

name: Aaron Liebo
text: All three employees were without masks, regardless of the state requirement. Very frustrating and disappointing. Go to Mellow Mushroom instead.

name: Viola Harvey
text: For ten years I've held the opinion that Zachary's is better than Little Star but tonight I'm not so sure. The classic deep dish was fantastic. AND the chicken wings are the best I can remember eating. Bonus.

name: John Haynes
text: Took a long time (2.5 hrs), but person taking the order was upfront and warned me it would take that long. To be fair, order was on a Sat night (move in day) in a beach town. They called me when pies were coming out of the oven. Had a twenty minute drive back to where we were staying, so wasn’t hot when we got there. Not their fault, and I imagine I could’ve gone 4.5 stars if I had been eating it right out of the oven. Prices were reasonable.

name: debby mcnicol
text: The pizza was great, the people were so friendly.  I will be back

resp.text: Debby, nothing beats a slice done right. Thanks for putting your faith in us and letting us deliver. Can't wait to welcome you back in for another pizza pie soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Steven Edwards
text: The pizza place we frequented while vacationing in Gulf Shores closed down so we've been looking for a new one. I think we've found it in Mama Lottie's. Excellent pizza, fresh and light, not greasy or heavy. Also ordered a large Cesar salad which was very good.

name: Hannah Lamborghini
text: The cheese sticks were AMAZING! The staff was very kind as well. 10/10 Recommend coming back again. The wait is like 14 minutes for a pizza but it’s so good.

name: Stephen Wardle
text: Solid pizza. The toppings are good and pizza tasted freshly made. The crust is a little weak to me. Rest was great.

name: Dennis Morgan
text: Surprisingly very good pizza.  It passed the crust flop test and the zaaaaa was delicious.  Better than a lot of pizzas in Chicago.

name: Cheryl Daves
text: Ordered the Long Island. It was tasty however it needed cheese on it. There just wasn't enough. We ordered an 18 in and it barely fed 3 people because it was so light. I'm from NY and I know pizza. I'd say this place is ok for a snack. Wasn't crazy about the dough. The fresh garlic is what made it ok.

name: Pete Belanger
text: Great pan style pizza.

resp.text: Appreciate you stopping by, Pete! Hope you make it back our way. -Devin, Manager

name: Mary Watkins
text: Great Service and great pizza and cheese sticks.  We were only in the city for 1 night.  So worth the wait (very busy night).  The called me when our order was done sooner than quoted.  Highly recommend!!

name: Jordon Hargrove
text:
Was able to order delivery to. Local campground so that was cool.  They were polite on the phone, and they showed up in like 25 minutes.

The pizza, meat lovers, was above average.  The calzone was amazing.

The wife and daughter had the manicotti and it was good, but cooler cold when it arrived.  We were able to warm it up in the microwave so not the end of the world.

Bread sticks where too dry and fluffy for our tastes, but that could just be us.

Would order pizza from them again.

name: Keith Williams
text: Great food and very friendly staff. Highly recommend for anyone who enjoys quality pizza at an affordable price. Wish there was a place this good where I live.

name: Ali Bacon
text: Delicious pizza, hot and tasty. Will definitely be back.

resp.text: Ali, nothing quite beats a great slice of pizza! So glad you love ours. Hope to see you back in soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Whitney Thrasher
text:
1. Great staff ! Very friendly, quick , and refills drinks quickly
2. Great prices !
3. The pizza is AMAZING !!!! We got a simple cheese pizza and it was AMAZING :)

DEFINITELY will be back the next time we're in gulf shores!!!!

name: Sue Maysonet
text: Excellent service, the pizza had great taste!

name: Lyndsey Howard
text: Delivery.com canceled our order after waiting almost 2 hours. We called Mama Lotties directly and got our pizza within 20 minutes. (We had to go pick it up, but that was fine.) Super friendly and much cheaper than ordering thru delivery.com. Pizza and cheese sticks were awesome.

name: Dustin Sayre
text: Great pizza excellent staff! They are always nice and friendly. The pizza is very tasty and not too stiff and not to soft just right. I eat here at least once a week and several of my employees do as well.

name: Alex Resendez
text: Pizza was on point and my wife's calzone was definitely to her liking. Staff was very nice and attentive also observed covid 19 protocols. Will definitely be going back for a pizza again.

name: Joan Pruden
text: Pizza is SO GOOD!! The wait is a bit long because they make pizzas fresh but the wait is worth it!!

name: Ashley Bullard
text: Me and my family walked in at 9:30pm and was told we could only order to go. There website & front door clearly states open until 11:00pm. Poor customer service and lacking in respect for families who are on vacation trying to have a good dining in experience.

name: Crystal Purvis
text: We eat here every trip we make to the beach and we've never been disappointed.

name: Shaneil Yarbrough
text: The staff were friendly and attentive. We started with breadsticks for the table and then enjoyed veggie, meatlovers, supreme, and philly steak individually. The food was good and served hot! We would definitely return.

name: Chris Denio
text: Friendly service and good pizza  !

resp.text: Chris, thanks for your review! We hope you'll be back again soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Dave Wilson
text: Pizza was very good. A little pricy and under the advertised size which makes it really pricy. That being said the crust is very good, the sauce is very good and the toppings were quality. The service was good and friendly. I would rank it the 2nd best pizza in the area only behind Vitolli's Pizza in Robertsdale.

name: Dustin Scarborough
text: We were referred by friends and we now call for take out at least once a week! If you want a quality pizza and a nice fresh salad this is your place!

name: Cam Sweat
text: Great food! Great prices for the amount of food and WONDERFUL staff! definitely recommend

name: Brandon Styles Live
text: Great place for pizza by the slice!

resp.text: It's great you enjoyed stopping by, Brandon! See you next time. -Devin, Manager

name: angie parr
text: The pizza was delicious!!!

name: Jennifer Lechleitner
text: Super friendly staff. I had the gluten free pizza and it was delicious. The guy who works there told me it’s a cauliflower crust (doesn’t taste like it but it’s delicious so I don’t really care what it is). No complaints.

name: George Ruper
text: Delicious pizza and cheese bread sticks. The young gentleman that waited on us was the best! We will definitely come here again next year.

name: Stephen Jenkins
text: Great pizza kids loved it.  Gluten free crust was delicious.

name: Kelli Johnson
text: Best cheese sticks I've ever had. They we're very thin and not all doughy and had lots of cheese and the garlic butter on them was so good too!! Pizza crust was thin and sauce was light and had a great flavor. Owner and staff very nice. We will be back for sure!

name: Anthony Lochrico
text: Cricos Pizza is way better

resp.text: Anthony, we're sorry to hear you weren't a fan of us. We understand that food is subjective and that our menu won't knock it out of the park for every single person. We're happy you've found a place you love! If you're ever back with us, ask for a suggestion -- we'd love to serve you something delicious! -Devin, Manager

name: David Lloyd
text: I love the lunch special. A pizza is always hot and fresh. The staff is friendly.It is in a convenient location to my work into my home. I recommend eating at this restaurant.

name: Lela Pollan
text: We ordered 14 pizzas for my son's wedding rehearsal dinner on 04/12/19.Devin the manager and his team were awesome. They delivered the pizza on time and was labeled as we requested. Everyone loved the pizza, there was none left over. I would highly recommend for your next event. Devin and his team were very friendly and the best customer service I've experienced in a while. Can't wait to go back to Mama Lotties for the best pizza in the South. Thanks guys for making our rehearsal dinner a huge success!!!

name: Jackson Chism
text: We were visiting Gulf Shores and were wanting something other than a chain pizza place. Pizza was incredible! Huge, New York style slices! Expect a little bit longer of a wait than your chain places, but it is absolutely worth it!

name: JulzDave Shute
text: Absolutely the best Italian (Pizza plus all the rest) Place here at the beach .. the secret is in the sauce and it will melt in your mouth! They also offer several Gluten-Free Pizza options and they taste just as good! A little pricier but you will not regret it. I used to live in Italy and this is the closest place I've ever had for true Italian food.

name: Nancy Litch
text: Very good pizza

resp.text: We're so glad you joined us, Nancy! We hope we'll see you here in the future. -Devin, Manager

name: Special Touch Restoration
text: Best pizza in town....

resp.text: Thanks so much for this excellent review! We hope you'll be coming back soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Jamie Dugger
text: Amazing! Perfect little family owned joint. Food was awesome! Staff was great! Highly recommend!

name: Layne Watts
text: I wish I knew the names of the folks who work here to shout them out. We stopped by on a Friday night and were their final order of that day. The margherita pizza was incredible! I'm a pizza fiend and enjoyed it greatly. I highly recommend fellow pizza fiends to check it out because it was simply full of flavor. The cannolis were excellent as well. If I'm ever back in the area, I'm definitely returning here!

name: Katie Colbert
text: Great food, reasonable prices. You will not regret treating yourself here. Pizza, pasta, salad. And the service is amazing! 🤗🍕🥗🍝🍕

text: Best pizza on the beach . Lovely staff . Owner Andy Joseph is hands on w his very impressive staff . Just wondering where the lovely Lori Bittle went

text: This is an awesome place with great people let you guys working there even though they're about to close still made me my food and cut up and joke with me the whole time I was sitting there waiting for it to get done like they've known me for years anytime I I come down here I will be going back

name: Adam Orgeron
text: Fantastic,  absolutely fantastic pizza. PSA, this isn't pizza hut or the likes. These are handmade pizzas send take time to make. It's not 30 minutes are your pizza is free. It takes a little time for them to make a large order, but OMG worth every second of wait time.

text: Best pizza and Greek salad in a long time. Quick, friendly and delish hole in the wall. Love those lil places!!! Thanks guys, keep up the great work, giving the fast and yummy experience, and serving food hot and drinks cold!

manicotti was non-existant  so switched to getting spaghetti and meatballs- would take 30 minutes to make-

So we went to another Italian place around the corner- we live here year round- we won’t go back there...

text: So i called first was put on hold after hearing then talk on and still on hold i walked in and then they tell me that there not taking anymore order when you close at 9 thats really i have never heard of a plce that turns away a customer

name: Sweet Melody (Music Plus)
text:
(Translated by Google) Delicious pizzas and with additions of your preference even more divine. Place to delight the palate.

(Original)
Deliciosas pizzas y con agregados de su preferencia mas divinas aún. Lugar para deleitar el paladar.

resp.text: Melody, thank you so much! Customizing your pizza certainly brings it to a whole new experience. We can't wait to see you back for another slice soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Darren Janesky
text: This was a fantastic meal! A unique menu with a delicious family recipe for their main feature. Another family operated business with the owners present to offer a friendly atmosphere. If youre unsure of what to choose you can order the meatball sampler and you wont be disappointed. Great establishment, we will be back!

name: Julia Peart
text: Love this little place! We will definitely visit again. We had the meatball flight and ravioli filled with meatballs. Everything was delicious and service was wonderful. Thank you for the great food and service!

name: Ashley Rodriguez
text:
Friendly staff, great decor, quick service.  If you're in the habit of hand-making your meatballs at home, like me, don't bother with the beef or sausage ones. The veggie (eggplant) ones were surprisingly good, the chicken ones were good, and the special they had that day was amazing. There was bacon involved.

I'd say the sauces are decent (pesto was the best I tried), the sides are quite good (broccoli was not overcooked), and the tiramisu was actually really tasty, which is rare!

name: Johncarlo Buitrago
text: Came for the brunch crawl. Food and drink was great! The only down side is how small the venue is. Perfect for a date or small lunch, but for any future big events there needs to be more seating (outdoors?) And deeper stocks of drinks.

name: Tammy H. Bridges
text: Loved it. Love the vibe and the food. Very unique experience. Server was also great. I look forward to going back.

name: Natalie Lambert
text: Very Good!  The owner & staff were very friendly.  Fun ambience and wall murals.  The food is delicious, local beers and TV's if you're looking for some place other than a bar to watch the game.

name: Sheree Hall
text: Delicious food. A bit pricey for the amount. The atmosphere is nice, but small.

name: Matthew Ashmore
text: Service was great. Good was great, except the actual meatballs themselves. Which is disappointing since they are supposed to be the feature of the restaurant.

name: LaceyRae Sport Visintainer
text: LOVE CASHIO'S! This is exactly what Birmingham's food scene needed. The meatballs are amazing. Cashio's has the coolest atmosphere, the banquette is the best place to sit.

name: Alabama Sedan
text: Just had a great meal at Casino's. Special Meatball in July is BBQ. I had 5 with a Caesar Salad. Also, came with two Sweet and Spicy Wickles Pickles (Delicious). Only sad note is the BBQ Meatballs only last this month. Not on regular menu. The staff was very friendly and engaging. Will definitely return maybe before July ends to get more BBQMs maybe 10 this time.

name: Carol Lacourse
text: Excellent choice if you want something unique and tasty.  The desert had our eyes rolling back it was that good.

name: Katie
text: Fantastic food and atmosphere. I've had everything from the buffalo chicken balls to the panini, and I've never been disappointed!

name: Geoffrey Harrington
text: Cashios is a great place to enjoy authentic Italian meatballs and pasta. Owner is very nice an accommodating. Sizeable portions and great dessert.

name: Jennifer Lopez
text: BEAUTIFUL atmosphere, fun staff, succulent food

name: alesia adams
text: Great concept and great food!  Definitely try the meatball flight.

name: Rachel Ozburn
text: Amazing dinner! Best customer service and wonderful food!

name: David Luke
text: What a great concept. And tasty meatballs

name: BG Iradji
text: Yummmmmmmmm!!  I just love how you can pick how much you want to eat.  It's almost like tapas which I lovvvvvvvvve.  Perfect for Lakeview!!!!

name: Korin Randazzo
text: This experience was not up to par of some of the other reviews. The meatballs were mediocre at best. All the different flavors tasted the same with a lack of spice and sauce deficiency. Would not return.

name: Judy B
text: I really wanted to try this place, but no gluten free meatballs...really? It's not hard at all to have an option for gf. I'm not being trendy, but have an allergy to it.

resp.text:
Hi Judy,

I apologize we don't have any GF meatballs but we actually have several gluten free options that aren't  meatballs. We keep chicken, fish (ask your server what we are serving), shrimp and scallops in house, all of these options go nicely over a variety of our gluten free sides. Salads, braised greens, broccolini, white beans or smashed potatoes. I hope this helps your GF diet and that you'll be back soon. Thanks for your feedback.

-Mary Susan Cashio
Owner

name: Mr. Smith
text: Made my and my wife both sick. Will never be back. They owe us for a missing two days of work.

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Smith,

We hate to hear that you and your wife were not well after eating with us.

We would like to avoid having the same problem with anyone else as well as find a way to make amends with you. Do you recall what it is that you and your wife had to eat? We would be happy to refund your meal or issue you a gift card. We sincerely apologize, and are going to do our best to pinpoint what the problem was. I can assure you we have never had a problem like this before brought to our attention. Again, we are so very sorry.

Best,
Mary Susan Cashio
Owner

name: Jordi Garcia-Diaz
text: Very Unique restaurant in Birmingham with a nice variety of meatballs.

text: Food was good and quick for lunch but the ordering with forms and pencils has got to go

name: stephanie lorino

They are pricey, but you can tell the difference in the quality and taste of the pizza. It's worth the cost! We will definitely be eating from here again! I think we've found our new favorite pizza!

resp.text:
We look forward to serving you that second time soon Kristin and thanks for the awesome 5-star feedback and your business!

Andy, Johnny's Pizza Customer Care

I stopped there for the first time today and ordered the Pepperoni Pizza.It was wonderful!
The Dough is perfect,crispy and it holds up the Toppings!
The Staff is very friendly!
I will definitely come back and eat in to try some more Items of their Menu.
Really awesome Pizza!I was very happy!

resp.text:

Andy, Johnny's Customer Care

text: Good slices. Thin and not too greasy.  Flavorful crust. Good NY vibes/decorations. New favorite pizza spot.

Andy, Johnny's Pizza Customer Care

name: Ken Karr
text: The food was really good, the music was good, and so was the service to start. Unfortunately our waitress was sent home in the middle of our meal and we wound up with one who would fill in. She was exactly that, a fill in. We have had worse service, but definitely felt forgotten after the first waitress left. Would we go back and try it again if we were to come to the area, you bet; the food was good and the service started out that way, so why not give them a second chance.

resp.text:
Hi Ken and thank you for the 4-Star rating.  We'll make sure to pass on your comments about the service interruption to the management so they may review your concerns and act accordingly - this isn’t typical and we apologize!  We do look forward to having you back again real soon as we appreciate your giving us another chance - see you next time!

Andy, Johnny's Pizza Customer Care

text: I just moved from bklyn to columbus less than a month ago. Naturally seeing this was a great sense of joy. Unfortunately, it was not quite what i normally get back home. Crust was really soggy and the calzone seemed greasy. As a native new yorker though i am going to give it another try in the future hoping maybe it was just a bad day or slice.

resp.text:
Hi Steven and welcome to Columbus.  We thank you for your business and very important feedback.  We strive hard to serve delicious tasting, high quality food every day and therefore we're sorry to hear that our pizza crust and calzone did not meet with your satisfaction during your recent visit and for that we apologize.  This is not typical as we've been serving satisfied customers for 43 years now, which makes this more disappointing to hear. We'll be sure to pass on your comments to the management team so they may address your concerns and act accordingly.  In addition, the owner of this location will want to contact you directly to discuss your review in hopes of making things right for your next visit.   Please email us at customercare@johnnyspizza.com with your preferred method of contact (whether by phone or email) and we will be in touch promptly. Thank you for your time and we look forward to your reply.

Andy, Johnny's Pizza Customer Care

text: Look I would have cranked four stars, the food is an easy 4 stars, buy the service just needs a little work to push it there. Great food really!

name: Sheryl Witt
text: This pizza is by far the best pizza I've had in years I've traveled around the united states and NY and there is no comparison.. it's been since 2013 when I was in NY that I've had pizza this good would recommend to anyone... If you want a true NY pizza experience johnny's is where it's at..  thank you so much 💕 it's worth every penny.. and do not forget to tip accordingly these girls work hard and service is exceptional.... Thank you kacee...

resp.text:
WOW - SO FANTASTIC to hear Sheryl!  Please come back for more of the same great food and friendly service soon - we sincerely appreciate your frequent patronage, recommendation and 5-star rating - THANKS AGAIN!

Andy, Johnny's New York Style Pizza

name: Michelle Allen
text:
So disappointed in the quality of this place. It used to be delicious and one of our favorite places to take the kids. I’ve ordered calzones from here for over a decade, and it’s always been good.. and the last 2 years we started going to another place because the quality of the food just went downhill. My husband placed an order for pickup and brought it home. The calzone he brought home, no joke, his iPhone 11 Pro Max is larger than this calzone.
It is 6”x6”, soggy and full of grease.  NOT AT ALL the way it used to be.. and I did call to express my complaint about it, because certainly I must have gotten a childs portion or something like that and the lady I spoke with had an attitude and was not very nice at all.
It’s just such a shame how this place had gone downhill.

resp.text:

We live about 20 min away. The manager was nice when I called and offered to make us another but I’m not really gonna drive 40min round trip for their screw up. And kind of ridiculous to ask me to. We are new to this area and this was our first experience with Johnnys. Needless to say it will be our last and we won’t be recommending it to anyone.   I’m trying to add pics but can’t seem to figure it out. But the pizza was doubled over on its self and when pulled back the toppings came off. That was half of one side of the 12”.

name: Robert Lake
text:
First you must know this place is a chain restaurant! They want you to think you are getting an authentic New York Pizza! I am originally from New York and the experience is a insult to being a New Yorker and being an Italian American to the Yankee pictures on the wall.

The food was far from authentic and the only thing I can say was good were the garlic knots.
I tasted my wife's lasagna and it was awful. The cook needs to go back for more training but I'm sure they are for from being classically trained at a place like this. Not one person looked Italian anyway.

Service was another story our table wasn't very clean but the waitress cleaned it better and apologized for it not being cleaner. They were busy at the time. My guess is there is no other "real Italian " place here. I do wish we went to carabbas where we went a few days prior. She was not very attentive and she blamed the cook for getting one of our orders wrong.

I do Not recommend this place at all. Go to Atlanta if you want the closest New York pizza experience!

Thank you

name: Kameal Lee
text: Do not eat there the employee was very rude and the management sucks and the owner is very unperfessional as well it is not a place for us...

resp.text:
Hello Kameal and thank you for your very important feedback.  We have been serving satisfied customers for over 10 years now and currently enjoy a 4.5 out of 5 positive rating on Google (Over 400 reviews) which makes reading your review very disappointing.  We take your comments very seriously and want to learn more about your experience.   We do apologize that an employee would make you feel this way as this is not typical nor acceptable.  We really need to know more specifics about what happened and we'll be sure to pass on your comments immediately to the management team so they may address your concerns and act accordingly.  In addition, the owner of this location will want to speak to you directly to discuss your review in hopes of learning more as well.  Please email us at customercare@johnnyspizza.com with your preferred method of contact (whether by phone or email) and we will be in touch promptly. Thank you for your time and we look forward to your reply.

Andy, Johnny's Customer Service Team
customercare@johnnyspizza.com
